title: RSLs and Colorful Fans along Coprates Chasma Ridge
description: An enhanced color image illustrates the “greenish” fans and deposits associated with RSL. Two of these fans transition downslope into ripples. (HiRISE IRB color--near-infrared, red, and blue-green bandpasses--are displayed as red, green, and blue, respectively).
theme:
MARS. The Red Planet, one of the most desirable
destinations for humanity
copyright: © University of Arizona (HiRISE, NASA, JPL, uahirise.org)
